main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) were reported in San Antonio, Texas, on various dates in August 1954.
interesting points: A metallic sphere about 6 ft in diameter was observed hovering 200 ft above the ground for 10 minutes., One observer reported seeing a small intense white light changing colors and moving erratically., Two young girls sighted an object darting in and out of clouds for 25 minutes., Sighting included a professional man's observation of a bright, brilliant object moving fast in the sky., Multiple reports indicated the objects were described as bright lights of varying intensity.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects including metallic spheres and bright lights
witness description: Includes military personnel and local residents.
